history.content:
As Prof Sahai would say, EE 126 is a better option than Stat 140 if you've taken CS 70 before

-------

I am not familiar with Math classes, but it's clear that 170 and 189 come with a heavy workload. I strongly suggest you should not take both simultaneously. And yes, 170 is helpful for 189. According to HKN, 188 could also be a prerequisite for 189. See https://hkn.eecs.berkeley.edu/courseguides/CS/189

As Prof Sahai would say, EE 126 is a better option than Stat 140 if you've taken CS 70 before

-------

According to HKN, 188 could also be a prerequisite for 189. See https://hkn.eecs.berkeley.edu/courseguides/CS/189
As Prof Sahai would say, EE 126 is a better option than Stat 140 if you've taken CS 70 before
As Prof Sahai would say, EE 126 is the better option than Stat 140 if you've taken CS 70 before

children.subject:
My 188 workload with Anca last spring was totally manageable. 170 and 189 are murderous (heard 189 is better in spring when Sahai does not teach it).

I know nothing about math but depending on the workload of those classes, and assuming you absolutely have to take these 6 in two semesters, I would say 188 should absolutely be taken before 189 if thats an option. I took 188 and 170 together and it was doable.

history.content:
Hi all, 

I am on my last year and a half at Berkeley. I am currently debating on the order of the courses I want to take.

The remaining courses to take are CS 170, CS 188, CS 189, STAT 140, MATH 128A, and MATH 185.

My initial plan was to take these in the following order:

  • Spring 2018: CS 170, MATH 128A, STAT 140
  • Fall 2018: CS 188, CS 189, MATH 185.

I know that the best thing would be to take one of those as a summer course, but that is no longer an option for me (since I have a prior commitment). I am mainly afraid of having an overwhelming workload on the Fall with the above plan. That being said, it is pretty much set in stone that I must take STAT 140 and CS 189 in that order. 

note: I have not taken CS 70. Only Math 55.

Anyone here has some advice on how to arrange 170, 128A, 185 and 188? I was also reading that taking 170 is helpful before taking 189. 

Any advice would be deeply appreciated!! Thanks all for your time :)
history.subject: Applied Math + Cluster in CS course advice
